name: Old Fashioned Apple Cake
author: TCCLOWN
summary: A moist apple cake that I make in an angel food pan.  Sauce is poured over cake when taken out of oven.  Delicious!
ingredients: 1 cup apple - peeled, cored, and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
In a large bowl, combine flour, 2 cups sugar, baking soda, salt and cinnamon
Make a well in the center and pour in the eggs, oil, orange juice and vanilla
Stir in the chopped apple, nuts and coconut
Bake in the preheated oven for 75 to 90 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
Pour glaze over cake and let stand for 1 hour before turning out
To make the glaze:  In a saucepan, combine butter, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda and 1/2 cup buttermilk
Bring to a rolling boil and pour over cake
